group.name: itsp-account
group.label: ITSP Account
group.description: The information that is specific to a given ITSP account.

setting.name: itsp-proxy-domain
setting.label: ITSP server domain name
setting.description: The domain name of the ITSP. This domain name is used to look up via DNS SRV the address of the SIP server the ITSP uses. If the ITSP does not provide this lookup mechanism specify a server address below.

setting.name: user-name
setting.label: User name
setting.description: The authentication user name attached to the account.

setting.name: itsp-proxy-address
setting.label: ITSP server address
setting.description: If the ITSP specifies a server address or name or an outbound proxy, enter it here. If nothing is specified, the route to the ITSP's server (outbound proxy) is determined by DNS lookup on the ITSP domain.

setting.name: use-global-addressing
setting.label: Use public address for call setup
setting.description: If checked (default), use the sipXbridge public address for SIP signaling and SipXRelay public address for SDP (media description). Otherwise, the local (LAN) address will be used. Using the local address assumes that the ITSP provides NAT traversal compensation.

setting.name: strip-private-headers
setting.label: Strip private headers
setting.description: When this flag is set sipxbridge will strip information can potentially identify the calling party. Subject, Call-Info, Organization, User-Agent, Reply-To, In-Reply-To and From header Display Name will be stripped.

setting.name: default-asserted-identity
setting.label: Use default asserted identity
setting.description: The asserted identity header may be used by the ITSP to determine the originating party for call setup requests. If checked (default), use the default asserted identity. Otherwise, you must enter a username@domain to override the default.

setting.name: register-on-initialization
setting.label: Register on initialization
setting.description: Defines whether or not to register with the given ITSP on initialization.

setting.name: itsp-registrar-address
setting.label: ITSP Registrar Address
setting.description: If the ITSP specifies a registrar different from the ITSP server address above, enter it here. Otherwise this setting is assumed to be identical to the ITSP server address.

setting.name: itsp-registrar-listening-port
setting.label: ITSP Registrar Listen Port
setting.description: The port where REGISTER requests are sent. Defaults to ITSP Server Port if nothing specified.

setting.name: sip-keepalive-method
setting.label: Method to use for SIP keepalive.
setting.description: Defines the message to use for SIP keepalive. If nothing is specified, CR-LF (empty SIP message) is used.

setting.name: rtp-keepalive-method
setting.label: Method to use for RTP keepalive.
setting.description: Defines the payload to use for media (RTP) keepalive.
